content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":26757,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/46f0f4b6-8645-4b76-9203-f1f5e5562f4e/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/46f0f4b6-8645-4b76-9203-f1f5e5562f4e/Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"46f0f4b6-8645-4b76-9203-f1f5e5562f4e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":429,\"height\":97},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The company provides voluntary medical insurance for working full-time and part-time Employees with 50% (including) and higher workload.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To apply for insurance, it is necessary to fill in the request on the Support Portal:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Click the link -
